description: Detects Possible Squirrel Packages Manager as Lolbin
name: Squirrel Lolbin
query: ((process.executable.text:*\\update.exe AND process.command_line.text:*.exe* AND process.command_line.text:(*\-\-processStart* OR *\-\-processStartAndWait* OR *\-\-createShortcut*)) AND (NOT ((process.command_line.text:*C\:\\Users\\* AND process.command_line.text:*\\AppData\\Local\\Discord\\Update.exe* AND process.command_line.text:*\ \-\-processStart\ Discord.exe* OR process.command_line.text:*C\:\\Users\\* AND process.command_line.text:*\\AppData\\Local\\GitHubDesktop\\Update.exe\ \-\-createShortcut\ GitHubDesktop.exe* OR process.command_line.text:*C\:\\Users\\* AND process.command_line.text:*\\AppData\\Local\\Microsoft\\Teams\\Update.exe\"\ \-\-processStart\ \"Teams.exe\"*))))
author: Karneades / Markus Neis
Jonhnathan Ribeiro
oscd.community
